ilk.annualFeeDesc: The Maker Protocol collects a Stability Fee on Dai that is generated from Maker Vaults. It is a variable-rate fee that changes when Makerâ€™s governing body votes on proposals put forth by Risk Teams.
ilk.currentPriceDesc: Current price of collateral {{collateral}} in DAI
ilk.debtFloorDesc: The minimum amount of DAI that can be minted for this type of Vault. This value is also called the "Dust Limit".
ilk.liqRatioDesc: If the $t(terms.vault) reaches below the minimum collateralization level it is considered undercollateralized and is subject to liquidation. Your collateral will then be partially auctioned off to cover outstanding debt and liquidation fee.
ilk.maxLiquidityDesc: The Maximum Liquidity specified, the amount of DAI that the users can be issued for this type of Vault.
ilk.title: {{ilk}} $t(terms.collateral) status
ilk.totalIssueDesc: Total amount of DAI issued by collateral

vault.colRatioDesc: The collateralization ratio is the ratio between the value of the tokens given as collateral and the value of the Dai debt outstanding, and defined as a percentage.
vault.debtDesc: Total amount of debt that this $t(terms.vault) owes
vault.freeCollateralDesc: Amount of tokens that is currently being locked in Vault but not used as collateral
vault.lockedCollateralDesc: Total amount of collateral that is locked in this vault
vault.liquidationPriceDesc: If the price of {{collateral}} falls any further, this vault will be liquidated.
vault.title: Vault status

wallet.title: Wallet status
wallet.description: Amount of token that wallet currently holds

savings.title: Saving Rate
savings.annualSavingRateDesc: Annual saving rate of the DSR

error.collateralTooLow: The vault's collateralization ratio is too low.
error.debtTooLow: Amount of bebt the vault owes is below the debt floor.
error.invalidCollateralFreeAmount: The amount of collateral trying to free exceeds the locked collateral amount.
error.invalidRepayAmount: The amount of $t(units.stableToken) being repayed is exceeding the debt.

error.debtTooLow: Amount of $t(units.stableToken) being minted is too low.
error.issuingTooMuchCoins: Amount of $t(units.stableToken) issued is above Maximum Liquidity

errors.requireConnection: $t(metamask.name) must be installed and connected in order to use this application.
errors.unsupportedNetwork:
This network is not supported.
Select another network on $t(metamask.name).

errors.errorWhileOpeningVault: An error occured while opening vault. Please try again.

vault.cardDesc: Create a new $t(terms.vault_one) or manage your existing $t(terms.vault_other).
vault.title: {{ilk}} $t(terms.vault_one) ({{id}})

errors.errorWhileMinting: An error occured while trying to mint $t(units.stableToken). Please try again.
errors.errorWhileRepaying: An error occured while trying to repay debt. Please try again.

earn.cardDesc: Deposit your $t(terms.stableToken) to $t(terms.savings) and earn savings.

deposit.title: Deposit Status
deposit.label: Deposit Balance
deposit.description: Amount of $t(terms.stableToken) currently being deposited at $t(terms.savings)

errors.errorWhileDeposit: An unexpected error occured. Please try again.
errors.errorWhileWithdraw: An unexpected error occured. Please try again.

notFound.title: This page could not be found
